search #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Introducir nombre del canal', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM) return d

[COLOR white]Clubtv.link: Usar VPN[/COLOR] a $doregex[clubtv]
clubtv #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige la lista: ', ['[COLOR white][B]lista 1[/B][/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 2[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 3[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 4[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 5[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 6[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 7[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 8[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 9[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista 10[/COLOR]','[COLOR white]lista Tdt Latinos[/COLOR]']) lists = ['http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android1.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android2.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android3.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android4.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android5.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android6.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android7.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android8.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android9.m3u','http://clubtv.link/Mp2003/android10.m3u','https://m3u.cl/lista/total.m3u'] return lists[ret]
